name: Bible Project
tagline: We Help People Experience the Bible as a Unified Story That Leads to Jesus
description: Bible Project is a Christian organization based in SE Portland, Oregon, known for creating free, high-quality Bible resources. Their mission is to help people experience the Bible as a unified story that leads to Jesus.
jobAppeal: Bible Project is a Christian organization based out of SE Portland, Oregon. Bible Project is remote-friendly, offers very generous benefits, and provides stipends for professional development. The main appeal for me is that I am someone who has benefitted form the Bible Projects free content. I would love to be a part of the team that makes what they do possible. I really appreciate the company culture. At Bible Project they actively try to foster connection among their employees through their virtual interest groups. They also have a 100% compensation rate for parental, caregiver, and medical leave. They really seem to care about their employees wellness, since they even schedule a four week rest period each year.
stackFit: The role aligns well with my current skills in JavaScript, HTML, and CSS. React and server-side knowledge are a plus, so I could contribute immediately without needing to acquire major new skills.
goalsInPosition: Contribute to the Classroom platform used by learners around the world
Grow under mentorship from experienced engineers and strengthen best practices
Be part of a mission-driven team that makes impactful content accessible for free

relatedPosition.title: Frontend Engineer
relatedPosition.description: Craft high-quality, tested web code for the Classroom platform using React and Remix; collaborate with teams and contribute to user-facing features.

name: Overflow
tagline: Making generosity frictionless through innovative technology
description: Overflow is a philanthropy platform based in Mountain View, CA, focused on making generosity frictionless for nonprofits, churches, and charities.
jobAppeal: Overflow is a philanthropy platform located in Moutain View, CA about 22 minutes from Menlo Park where my Fiancee works. I want to work here mainly because of what a good fit seems to be. It uses most of the tech stack I learned from CodeStack Academy, and I admire Overflow’s mission to make generosity frictionless. Grow into a Senior Engineer role and contribute to Overflow’s mission

name: Department of State Hospitals (California)
tagline: Delivering behavioral healthcare through stable and secure government employment
description: The Department of State Hospitals (DSH), based in Sacramento, CA, treats and evaluates the behavioral health needs of patients mandated for treatment by court order. It offers long-term opportunities and job stability through California state government employment.
jobAppeal: I would like to work for the Department of State Hospitals because of the stability and long term opportunities working for the California State government. Located in the at our state capital, Sacramento, California, the Department of State Hospitals mostly treats and evaluates the behavioral health needs of patients mandated for treatment by a criminal or civil court judge.
stackFit: There is some overlap with my current stack. I would need to learn Azure DevOps and ServiceNow to be fully integrated with the team.
goalsInPosition: Gain experience working for the California state government
Transition into roles at other departments within the state system
Familiarize myself with the tech stacks commonly used in government projects

relatedPosition.title: Software Developer
relatedPosition.description: Support system integrations, full-stack applications, and ServiceNow development using technologies such as C#, .NET, and Azure DevOps in a collaborative environment.

name: Angel Studios
tagline: Where viewers decide what stories get told
description: Angel Studios is a streaming platform where the audience gets to choose and support the content they want to see. Their unique, viewer-driven model helps launch projects through crowdfunding and community voting.
jobAppeal: As an avid consumer of media, I think working for Angel Studios would be very cool. I really like their approach to content creation, where it is highly viewer and investor driven. Viewers can sign up for Angel Studio’s guild service and vote on project ideas that could end up getting theatrical or streaming releases. Angel Studios offers great benefits including medical, dental, and vision for employees and their dependents. They offer a 401k with employer matching, a health savings account, stock options, life insurance, pet insurance, and identity theft insurance.
stackFit: Unfortunately there is limited overlap between the Angel Studios tech stack and my current stack. While I know Javascript, React, some SQL, and APIs, I would have to learn NodeJs, PostgreSQL, and MarTech softwares.
goalsInPosition: Learn more about backend technologies for streaming platforms

relatedPosition.title: Senior Full Stack Engineer (MarTech)
